mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (member_id, member_name, password, nickName, email, country, isAdmin) VALUE (#{member_id}, #{member_name}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{country}, #{isAdmin})
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET member_name = #{member_name}, password = #{password}, nickName = #{nickName}, email = #{email}, country = #{country}, isAdmin = #{isAdmin} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_name, password, nickName, email, country, inserted, isAdmin FROM Member ORDER BY inserted DESC;
